content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at Position (-5.5, 19.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Steam Engine at position (-5.5, 19.5)
- Boiler at position (-2.5, 24.0)
- Offshore Pump at position (-9.5, 24.5)
- Pipe Group connecting from position (-5.5, 16.5) to (-8.5, 23.5)
- Electricity Group at position (-5.4, 20.0)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors with Fuel Management
- Ensure that the boiler has a consistent supply of fuel (coal) to maintain operation. Check inventory before attempting to insert fuel to avoid failures due to insufficient resources.

### Errors in Electricity Network Connection
- Connect the steam engine to an electricity network to ensure it is operational. Use small electric poles to connect the electricity group to the network.

### Errors in List Indexing
- When creating paths or accessing lists, ensure that the indices are within the valid range to avoid "IndexError: list index out of range".

### Errors when Placing into a Tile Which is Occupied by Another Entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it. Check if the tile is occupied to avoid placement errors.

### Errors with No Existing Electricity Group
- Verify that an electricity group exists before attempting to connect to it. If none exists, create one using available resources like small electric poles.
